sentences.sentence: He decided to do something about reforesting man-made wastes of western Australia.
sentences.translation: 他决定了在澳大利亚西部的人造垃圾地带重新造林。

sentences.sentence: Soaps and other wastes can harm waterways.
sentences.translation: 肥皂和其他废弃物会损害水道。

sentences.sentence: There are many other ways to reuse wastes.
sentences.translation: 当然还有很多其他废物利用的方法。
